text: if you're a lover of radishes like me
you've probably had that classic French
hors d'oeuvre radishes with softened
butter and sea salt well this version is
a little more American and it uses
peanutbutter may sound strange but I
promise you it's so delicious you'll
want two parts peanut butter to one part
regular unsalted butter and it should be
at room temperature so I'm using half a
stick of butter and that would require
half a cup of peanut butter you could
use crunchy peanut butter but i like to
use creamy peanut butter because it's a
nice contrast to the crunchy crisp
radishes so measure out half a cup and
then just stir them together until
they're completely smooth and you don't
see any of that butter give that a
vigorous stir you could even whip it if
you wanted it lighter an area although I
don't bother you can see it takes on a
glossy Sheen when it comes together like
this and then just transfer it to a
serving bowl this is excellent as a
snack or for an hors d'oeuvre even a
light and healthy lunch or breakfast so
pretty and there you have it that takes
mere moments now you really should buy
radishes with nice vibrant green tops
they're perfectly edible and delicious
use a mild radish like a breakfast
radish or a red globe radish and give a
dip and a sprinkle a mouth-watering
big-time here
so delicious yum yum yum I'm happy
eating
you
